meta.title: Early Adopter Campaign
meta.description: Get the Early Adopter credential by connecting with Internet Identity, showcasing your status as one of the first to test advanced identity tech on the Internet Computer. Use this credential to join an exclusive OpenChat room and unlock future prizes.

mainLead: Get the Early Adopter credential by connecting with Internet Identity, showcasing your status as one of the first to test advanced identity tech on the Internet Computer. Use this credential to join an exclusive OpenChat room and unlock future prizes.
howtoTitle: Use a verifiable credential to access an exclusive OpenChat group
howtoLead: The Early Adopter campaign empowers you to test out Internet Identity’s newest feature: verifiable credentials. Whether you’re a developer, user, or digital identity enthusiast, earn an Early Adopter credential, and hold a piece of history on the Internet Computer.

howtoSteps.title: Sign up with Internet Identity
howtoSteps.body: Click “Let’s go!” and sign up for the Early Adopter campaign with Internet Identity.

howtoSteps.title: Get your credential
howtoSteps.body: By signing up, the Early Adopter credential will be issued to your Internet Identity.

howtoSteps.title: Join an exclusive chat on Openchat
howtoSteps.body: Using your credential, you will be able to join a private group chat on OC.

innovationLead: With verifiable credentials on the Internet Computer, it is easier and safer for people and organizations to share information with one another.

innovationCards.title: Verifiable
innovationCards.body: A verifiable credential is a piece of data that’s source, integrity, validity, and ownership can be instantly verified.

innovationCards.title: Private
innovationCards.body: Whenever a user shares a credential with an app, a new identifier is created for the user, which prevents apps from tracking users across the web.

innovationCards.title: Reusable
innovationCards.body: Users can share credentials with apps on a need-to-know basis to authorize their access to exclusive services.

innovationCards.title: Secure
innovationCards.body: Verifiable credentials are stored 100% on-chain, which safeguards businesses and users from the potential liability of data breaches and fraud.

connectionLead: Connect with Internet Identity to instantly earn the Early Adopter credential, a piece of data that proves you are one of the first people to try groundbreaking identity technology on the Internet Computer. Using your Early Adopter credential, you can access an exclusive chatroom on OpenChat and earn future prizes.
